sense.def:
Overnight
pomeni od večera do jutra.

seg.quote: Soak the raisins overnight in water.

sense.def:
Prtljago ali obleko, ki je
overnight
, vzamemo s seboj, ko nekje prespimo noč ali dve.

seg.quote: He packed a little overnight bag.

sense.def:
Nekaj se zgodi
overnight
, kadar se zgodi hitro in nepričakovano.

seg.quote: The colonel became a hero overnight.
You can't expect these problems to be solved overnight.
